title: Shows promise - should go far (TEFC)
creator_credit: Yorkshire Harlech Television, Michael Deakin and Michael Tuchner
brief_description: A study of four exceptional children in one family. Each child excels in at least one area of learning, eg., mathematics, music, painting. The film looks at the children’s upbringing and its influence on their development. Their mother explains her situation and philosophy underlying her upbringing of the children.
